20101202011011.000|20101202011013.500|CCO|IRANIAN FOOTBALLER HAS BEEN
20101202011013.500|20101202011016.000|CCO|EXECUTED.
20101202011016.000|20101202011018.500|CCO|DESPITE WORLDWIDE PLEAS FOR
20101202011018.500|20101202011021.000|CCO|MERCY AND CLAMS HER CHILD WAS ON
20101202011021.000|20101202011023.500|CCO|FERRICK, NASSER MOHAMMADKHANI
20101202011023.500|20101202011026.000|CCO|WAS HANGED.
20101202011026.000|20101202011028.500|CCO|SHE WAS FOUND GUILTY TO STABBING
20101202011028.500|20101202011031.000|CCO|TO DEATH NASSER MOHAMMADKHANI.
20101202011031.000|20101202011033.000|CCO|IN AFGHANISTAN, AROUND 60% OF
20101202011033.000|20101202011035.000|CCO|THE POPULATION IS SUFFERING FROM
20101202011035.000|20101202011037.000|CCO|MENTAL ILLNESS.
